channel.title: How to make items 2 handed?
channel.description: Okay, so I have added things like godsword and d claws, now how I make them 2 handed? Also, how I make godsword stand like real rs? Thanks guys! Arham

item.title: How to make items 2 handed?
item.dc:creator: @kingman002 kingman002
item.description:
@kingman002 wrote:

int targetSlot = 0; targetSlot = itemType(wearID); int[] two_hand = {Itemid, itemid, itemid}; for (int element : two_hand) { if ((wearID == element) && (playerEquipment[playerShield] > 0)) { if (playerHasItem(-1)) { addItem(playerEquipment[playerShield], 1); playerEquipment[playerShield] = -1; playerEquipmentN[playerShield] = 0; setEquipment(-1, 0, playerShield); } else { sM("Not enough space in your inventory."); return false; } } if ((itemType(wearID) == playerShield) && (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == element)) { if (playerHasItem(-1)) { addItem(playerEquipment[playerWeapon], 1); playerEquipment[playerWeapon] = -1; playerEquipmentN[playerWeapon] = 0; setEquipment(-1, 0, playerWeapon); } else { sM("Not enough space in your inventory."); return false; } } }

Read full topic

lorenso:

Go to client.java search for the Bandos godsword item ID (I think its 667 not sure) Search it in client.java and u will see the bandos godsword id the sara godsword id ect, add ur id for ur weapon there too and then search it again untill u have put it everywhere.

Not work, didn’t find any results. Remember im delta if that what you were not thinking.
